bugs.description: Scheduler.idle_seconds assumes `self.next_run` is always a datetime, but `next_run` property returns None when no jobs are scheduled. When the job list is empty, evaluating `(self.next_run - datetime.datetime.now()).total_seconds()` raises a TypeError (NoneType subtraction). The method should handle the `None` case (e.g., return None or float('inf')).
